au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: ga_19280_apx10_240910
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(19280,0) # Drive guide to ga config driveGuide(guideConfig.ga) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -72) # Drive entrance aperture to 150 (for ga) driveEntRotAp(150) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(40, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(210)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(40, 0) driveBsz(249)
